verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 146:1 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f* \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 146:1 \ft LORD or GOD in all caps is from the Hebrew יהוה Yahweh except when otherwise noted as being from the short form יה Yah.\f* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H5750"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* exist.

Don’t put \w your|strong="H1121"\w* trust \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* whom there \w is|strong="H1121"\w* no \w help|strong="H8668"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w departs|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w returns|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* earth. \w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* very \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H6250"\w* perish.

Happy \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w*, whose \w hope|strong="H7664"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*; \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w keeps|strong="H8104"\w* truth \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*;

\w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w executes|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*; \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* frees \w the|strong="H5414"\w* prisoners.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w opens|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w raises|strong="H2210"\w* \w up|strong="H2210"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w bowed|strong="H3721"\w* \w down|strong="H3721"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* loves \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserves|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1616"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* upholds \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* widow, \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* turns \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* upside \w down|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 146:10 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f*
